extensions.{786abda0-fd14-d247-bf69-38b2.message: Empties the Trash and Junk folders, and compacts folders in multiple Thunderbird accounts.

xpunge.options.multi.label.emptied.accou.message: Selected Trash Cans And Junk Folders To Be Emptied:

xpunge.options.settings.multi.checkbox.c.message: Show confirmation dialog before executing MultiXpunge.

xpunge.options.settings.single.checkbox..message: Show confirmation dialog before executing Xpunge.

xpunge.options.timer.auto.tooltip.loop.message: A positive integer or zero. Zero means no loop Xpunge.

xpunge.options.timer.auto.tooltip.startu.message: A positive integer or zero. Zero means no startup Xpunge.

xpunge.options.timer.label.emptied.accou.message: Selected Trash Cans And Junk Folders To Be Emptied:

xpunge_multi_str_compact_already_added.message: The selected account/folder has already been added to the "Compact" list.

xpunge_multi_str_compact_invalid_account.message: ERROR: The selected account/folder is invalid!

xpunge_multi_str_compact_invalid_addall_.message: ERROR: The list of available accounts/folders has an invalid number of children!

xpunge_multi_str_compact_save_fixed_msg.message:
ERROR: Invalid entries found while saving the "Compact" list for MultiXpunge.

An attempt has been made to repair them.

Open the Xpunge preferences again to see what has changed.

xpunge_multi_str_confirm_msg_body.message:
You have chosen to call MultiXpunge with the following settings:



TRASH CANS TO BE EMPTIED: $P1$

JUNK FOLDERS TO BE EMPTIED: $P2$

FOLDERS/ACCOUNTS TO BE COMPACTED: $P3$



Are you sure you want to continue?

xpunge_multi_str_junk_save_fixed_msg.message:
ERROR: Invalid entries found while saving the "Junk Folders" list for MultiXpunge.

An attempt has been made to repair them.

Open the Xpunge preferences again to see what has changed.

xpunge_multi_str_trash_save_fixed_msg.message:
ERROR: Invalid entries found while saving the "Trash Can" list for MultiXpunge.

An attempt has been made to repair them.

Open the Xpunge preferences again to see what has changed.

xpunge_pref_migration_error_1.message: There was a problem during the migration of the Xpunge preferences!

xpunge_pref_migration_error_3.message: Open the Preferences window in Xpunge and check the preferences. If something does not look right, you can either set up the preferences again or try to recover the previous preferences.

xpunge_pref_migration_error_4.message: For more information about how to recover the previous preferences, visit the following web page:

xpunge_single_str_confirm_msg_body.message:
You have chosen to call Xpunge on the "$P1$" account. Your settings are the following:



EMPTY TRASH: $P2$

EMPTY JUNK: $P3$

COMPACT FOLDERS: $P4$



Are you sure you want to continue?
